SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC) AS RNUM, BRCH_NAME, ENROLL_DATE, SALES_PRICE, ORD_PRICE, (SALES_PRICE-ORD_PRICE) AS NET_PRICE FROM(SELECT NVL(O.BRCH_NAME,S.BRCH_NAME) AS BRCH_NAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(O.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(S.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))AS ENROLL_DATE, NVL(ORD_PRICE,0) AS ORD_PRICE, NVL(SALES_PRICE,0) AS SALES_PRICE FROM (SELECT B.BRCH_NAME, O.ENROLL_DATE, SUM(I.PRICE) AS ORD_PRICE FROM ORD O INNER JOIN ORD_ITEM I ON O.ORD_NO = I.ORD_NO INNER JOIN BRCH B ON O.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO WHERE (O.STAT_CODE = 0 OR O.STAT_CODE = 2 OR O.STAT_CODE = 4 OR O.STAT_CODE = 5 OR O.STAT_CODE = 6 OR O.STAT_CODE = 8)
AND O.BRCH_NO = #{brch_choice}
AND O.BRCH_NO = 2
GROUP BY B.BRCH_NAME, O.ENROLL_DATE)O FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT B.BRCH_NAME, S.ENROLL_DATE, SUM(M.CNT * P.MENU_PRICE) AS SALES_PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU M ON S.SALES_NO = M.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU P ON M.MENU_NO = P.MENU_NO INNER JOIN BRCH B ON S.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO WHERE S.CNL_DATE IS NULL
AND S.BRCH_NO = #{brch_choice}
AND S.BRCH_NO = 2
GROUP BY B.BRCH_NAME, S.ENROLL_DATE) S ON O.BRCH_NAME = S.BRCH_NAME AND O.ENROLL_DATE = S.ENROLL_DATE)
WHERE ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')
WHERE ENROLL_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')
WHERE ENROLL_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')
)

AND O.BRCH_NO = #{brch_choice}

GROUP BY B.BRCH_NAME, O.ENROLL_DATE)O FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT B.BRCH_NAME, S.ENROLL_DATE, SUM(M.CNT * P.MENU_PRICE) AS SALES_PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU M ON S.SALES_NO = M.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU P ON M.MENU_NO = P.MENU_NO INNER JOIN BRCH B ON S.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO WHERE S.CNL_DATE IS NULL

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SALES_NO) AS NUM, BRCH_NO, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_TIME, SALES_NO, CARD_PAY, CASH_PAY, (CARD_PAY + CASH_PAY) AS TOT_PAY, TO_CHAR(NVL(CNL_DATE, TO_DATE('1111-11-11','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AS CNL_DATE FROM (SELECT NVL(B.BRCH_NO, A.BRCH_NO) AS BRCH_NO, NVL(B.ENROLL_DATE, A.ENROLL_DATE) AS ENROLL_DATE, NVL(A.SALES_NO, B.SALES_NO) AS SALES_NO, NVL(A.PRICE, 0) AS CARD_PAY, NVL(B.PRICE, 0) AS CASH_PAY, NVL(A.CNL_DATE, B.CNL_DATE) AS CNL_DATE FROM (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE, S.CNL_DATE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 0 AND S.BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enroll_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.CNL_DATE ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) A FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE, S.CNL_DATE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 1 AND S.BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enroll_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.CNL_DATE ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) B ON A.SALES_NO = B.SALES_NO AND A.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO AND A.ENROLL_DATE = B.ENROLL_DATE) ORDER BY SALES_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SALES_NO) AS NUM, BRCH_NO, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_TIME, SALES_NO, CARD_PAY, CASH_PAY, (CARD_PAY + CASH_PAY) AS TOT_PAY FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN B.BRCH_NO IS NULL THEN A.BRCH_NO ELSE B.BRCH_NO END AS BRCH_NO, CASE WHEN B.ENROLL_DATE IS NULL THEN A.ENROLL_DATE ELSE B.ENROLL_DATE END AS ENROLL_DATE, CASE WHEN A.SALES_NO IS NULL THEN B.SALES_NO ELSE A.SALES_NO END AS SALES_NO, CASE WHEN A.PRICE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE A.PRICE END AS CARD_PAY, CASE WHEN B.PRICE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.PRICE END AS CASH_PAY FROM (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 0 AND S.BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enroll_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.PAY_METHOD ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) A FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 1 AND S.BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enroll_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.PAY_METHOD ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) B ON A.SALES_NO = B.SALES_NO AND A.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO AND A.ENROLL_DATE = B.ENROLL_DATE) ORDER BY SALES_NO)

SELECT SUM(CARD_PAY) AS CARD_PAY, SUM(CASH_PAY) AS CASH_PAY, (SUM(CARD_PAY)+SUM(CASH_PAY)) AS TOT_PAY FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN B.BRCH_NO IS NULL THEN A.BRCH_NO ELSE B.BRCH_NO END AS BRCH_NO, CASE WHEN B.ENROLL_DATE IS NULL THEN A.ENROLL_DATE ELSE B.ENROLL_DATE END AS ENROLL_DATE, CASE WHEN A.SALES_NO IS NULL THEN B.SALES_NO ELSE A.SALES_NO END AS SALES_NO, CASE WHEN A.PRICE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE A.PRICE END AS CARD_PAY, CASE WHEN B.PRICE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.PRICE END AS CASH_PAY FROM (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 0 AND S.CNL_DATE IS NULL AND S.BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enroll_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.PAY_METHOD ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) A FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 1 AND S.CNL_DATE IS NULL AND S.BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE(#{enroll_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.PAY_METHOD ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) B ON A.SALES_NO = B.SALES_NO AND A.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO AND A.ENROLL_DATE = B.ENROLL_DATE) GROUP BY ENROLL_DATE ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE
